name: Eclipse (itch) (FGKeiji)
description:
Built in Godot 4.0, so will likely only run in Chrome for HTML version.

Controls

ActionKeyboardGamepadUpW/SpaceD-Pad Up/Left Stick Up
DownSD-Pad Down/Left Stick DownLeftAD-Pad Left/Left Stick LeftRightDD-Pad Right/Left Stick RightPrimaryJ/LMBXbox A/DS X/Nintendo BSecondaryK/RMBXbox  B/DS O/Nintendo A

The captain of the Eclipse is notorious in the skies for wielding the cursed Crescent Saber and Shining Pistol. The captain's attunement to the weapons becomes stronger as ships are raided. Will enemy crews or the hunger of  the    sun and moon be the captain's downfall?
